masks.name: Gnarled Visage
masks.description: Twisted wood, weathered by centuries of whispered curses.

masks.name: Iron Grimace
masks.description: Cold metal that drinks deep of battle fury.

masks.name: Fleshy Grin
masks.description: Leathery skin stretched over ancient cartilage. It still twitches.

masks.name: Scrimshaw Awe
masks.description: Carved from the skull of something that refused to stay dead.

masks.name: Void Crown
masks.description: A crown of pure absence. Wearing it is like drowning in power.

masks.name: Ember Shroud
masks.description: Smoke and ash given form. It whispers of forgotten pyres.

masks.name: Calcified Howl
masks.description: A scream frozen in bone. Its rage never fades.

masks.name: Crimson Tyrant
masks.description: Dripping with the blood of a thousand battles. It hungers for more.

masks.name: Begger's Gaze
masks.description: Hollow eyes that beg for what they can never have.

masks.name: Splintered Smile
masks.description: Cracked and broken, yet it grins on.

masks.name: Ashen Veil
masks.description: The residue of something burned beyond recognition.

masks.name: Sanguine Maw
masks.description: Teeth and tongues woven together. It tastes your fear.

masks.name: Obsidian Leer
masks.description: Black glass that reflects only darkness.

masks.name: Charnel Grin
masks.description: The smile of something that died laughing at death itself.

masks.name: Flayed Sovereign
masks.description: Royalty stripped of everything but power.

masks.name: Abyssal Membrane
masks.description: A thin veil between worlds. Wear it and touch the void.

masks.name: Gorewreath
masks.description: A crown of viscera and sinew. Beautiful in its brutality.

masks.name: Ossuary Crown
masks.description: Built from the bones of forgotten kings.

masks.name: Carrion Psalm
masks.description: A hymn to decay, sung in flesh and bone and shadow.
